keyMoments.title: Guernika Debuts as CP0 Agent
keyMoments.description: Guernika, a masked CP0 agent, makes his first appearance in Dressrosa, observing events on the island as part of the World Government's elite intelligence operations.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of a CP0 agent in the series, establishing the presence of the world's strongest intelligence agency.

reveals.information: Member of CP0, the World Government's strongest intelligence agency

keyMoments.title: Joseph Debuts as CP0 Agent
keyMoments.description: Joseph, a CP0 agent, makes his first appearance alongside other CP0 members in Dressrosa.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the first introduction of CP0 agents in the series.

keyMoments.title: Gismonda Debuts as CP0 Agent
keyMoments.description: Gismonda, a CP0 agent, makes her first appearance alongside other CP0 members in Dressrosa.
keyMoments.significance: Part of the first introduction of CP0 agents in the series.

keyMoments.title: Wicca Steals Zoro's Sword
keyMoments.description: A mysterious 'fairy' steals Zoro's sword Shusui. Zoro chases and catches the thief, who is later revealed to be Wicca, a dwarf from the Tontatta Kingdom posing as a fairy.
keyMoments.significance: First introduction of the Tontatta dwarves, who play a crucial role in revealing Dressrosa's secrets and the truth about Doflamingo's operations.

reveals.information: Member of the Tontatta dwarf tribe
Exceptional speed and stealth, able to steal items without being detected

keyMoments.title: Bellamy Reunites with Luffy
keyMoments.description: Bellamy encounters Luffy at the Corrida Colosseum for the first time since their confrontation at Jaya. He shows respect for Luffy, acknowledging that Sky Island was real and demonstrating significant character growth.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Bellamy's transformation from a dream-mocking antagonist to someone who respects Luffy's achievements, setting up their complex relationship in Dressrosa.
keyMoments.quote: It's been a while, Straw Hat.

bounties.reason: Post-timeskip bounty showing significant increase in strength and notoriety

relationships.description: After learning Sky Island was real, Bellamy gained respect for Luffy and no longer mocks his dreams. Their relationship evolved from antagonistic to complex mutual acknowledgment.

evolutionMoments.description: Bellamy greets Luffy respectfully at the Corrida Colosseum, showing he has moved past their previous conflict.

reveals.information: Bellamy has undergone significant character growth, now respecting Luffy and acknowledging the validity of dreams
Post-timeskip bounty increased to 195 million berries

keyMoments.title: Bartolomeo Enters Block B Arena
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo makes his dramatic entrance into the Corrida Colosseum's Block B battle, introduced as having a bounty of 150 million berries and being the person the crowd most wants to disappear.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Bartolomeo as a major competitor in the tournament and builds mystery around his abilities and reputation.

keyMoments.title: Bartolomeo Defeats Vice Admiral Maynard
keyMoments.description: After his crew member Gambia is knocked down by Vice Admiral Maynard (in disguise), Bartolomeo violently defeats the Vice Admiral, demonstrating his strength and loyalty to his crew.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Bartolomeo's combat prowess and fierce loyalty, establishing him as a formidable fighter capable of defeating a Vice Admiral.

keyMoments.title: Hint at Barrier Ability
keyMoments.description: Bartolomeo is shown crossing his fingers in specific gestures, hinting at his Bari Bari no Mi (Barrier-Barrier Fruit) Devil Fruit powers.
keyMoments.significance: First visual clue to Bartolomeo's Devil Fruit ability, which creates nearly indestructible barriers.

bounties.reason: Super Rookie bounty, described as cruel and crazy, most wanted to disappear by the public

abilities.description: Bartolomeo can create nearly indestructible barriers by crossing his fingers, though he can only maintain one at a time.

reveals.information: Bounty of 150 million berries as a Super Rookie
Known as cruel and crazy, holds the number one spot for person the public most wants to disappear
Hints at barrier-creating Devil Fruit ability through hand gestures
